summary: Request to add time management interface for PHP test server, including time skipping, sleep functionality, and current time retrieval capabilities.
userImpact: Users need better control over time in test environments to write more reliable and faster tests.
proposedFix: Add interface methods to toggle time skipping, sleep, and retrieve current time from test server.
keyQuote: Add interface to affect test server behaviour: toggle time skipping, sleep, current time retreiving
